channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China tells Rubio to behave himself in veiled warning
UnitedHealthcare names new CEO after Brian Thompson's killing
item.description: The largest U.S. insurer promoted company executive Tim Noel to replace Thompson, whose death sparked a national outcry over the health care industry.

item.title: U.S. puts virtually all foreign aid on 90-day hold, issues 'stop-work' order
item.description: Following Trump's Monday freeze on foreign aid, a subsequent memo calls for for a stop-work order for current grants and contracts.

item.title: Musk, MrBeast, Larry Ellison - Who might buy TikTok?
item.description: Several potential US buyers have expressed interest in purchasing the social media platform.

item.title: Pete Hegseth, Trump's embattled pick for defense secretary, wins Senate confirmation
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance cast a tie-breaking vote as Hegseth overcame allegations of sexual assault, public drunkenness and questions of financial mi...

item.title: "CBS Evening News" headlines for Friday, Jan. 24, 2025
item.description: Here's a look at the top stories making headlines on the "CBS Evening News" with Nancy Cordes.

item.title: Trump re-enacts policy banning aid to groups abroad that discuss or provide abortions
item.description: The Mexico City Policy cuts off U.S. aid to health groups in other countries that offer abortion services or counseling. As in 2021, Trump has reinsta...

item.title: Trump tours LA fire destruction amid worries about disaster aid
item.description: Trump travelled to California amid concerns he might withhold disaster aid to the liberal state.

item.title: 'My family was murdered at Auschwitz. Her grandfather drove trains to the camp'
item.description: Amie, a descendant of a Holocaust survivor, meets Cornelia, who is untangling her family's Nazi past.

item.title: Arrest warrant proposed for Taliban leaders for gender-based crimes
item.description: The International Criminal Court, a U.N. agency, has to approve the warrants. They've been condemned by the Taliban and welcomed by Afghan women and t...

item.title: Trump proposes ‘getting rid of FEMA’ while touring disaster areas
item.description: President Donald Trump says he is considering “getting rid of” the Federal Emergency Management Agency.

item.title: Senate confirms Pete Hegseth as defense secretary with Vance breaking a 50-50 tie
item.description: The Senate voted Friday to confirm former Fox News host and military veteran Pete Hegseth as the next secretary of defense. Vice President JD Vance br...

item.title: Speaker Mike Johnson plans to look into Jan. 6 and its investigation committee
item.description: Many Republican lawmakers have said that they want to "look forward, not back" regarding Jan. 6 and President Trump's pardons. But House Speaker Mike ...

item.title: Gaza rescuers face toll of their work: 'I have become afraid of my own memories'
item.description: Throughout the Israeli bombardment, the Civil Defence was responsible for pulling the living and the dead from the rubble.

item.title: ‘We’ve got to move forward’ - Michigan electric vehicle industry responds to Trump policy changes
RFK Jr.'s financial disclosures reveal millions in both debt and income
item.description: Financial disclosures show that Robert F. Kennedy Jr., President Trump's Health and Human Services Secretary nominee, is saddled with millions in debt...

item.title: Pete Hegseth confirmed as US defence secretary in tie-breaking vote
item.description: The one-time Fox News television host and combat veteran was narrowly confirmed in the Senate late on Friday.

item.title: Senate confirms Pete Hegseth as defense secretary; Vance casts tiebreaking vote
item.description: Pete Hegseth's nomination once appeared on shaky ground amid allegations that included sexual misconduct and financial mismanagement.
